title.rendered: elegance by design and a photographic section to dominate each scene

content.rendered:
We are talking about a phone that boasts an exquisite design, with recognizable and attractive lines to make a difference, as well as technical features that include the best hardware on the market. But, without a doubt, the great element with which this phone manages to be the best reference has to do with the Xiaomi 12 Pro camera.

8K, Xiaomi ProFocus… This camera has it all

Xiaomi knows the importance of photography on a mobile, so has provided the camera of the Xiaomi 12 Pro with the best technology. To begin with, it mounts a 50-megapixel Sony IMX707 main sensor with f/1.9 aperture, accompanied by a second 50-megapixel wide-angle sensor with f/2.2 aperture, as well as a third 50-megapixel telephoto sensor with f/1.9 aperture, which is capable of 2X optical zoom.

Undoubtedly, a high configuration to get some scandalous photographs and the one that adds artificial intelligence and software algorithms to offer even better results. We see the best example in Xiaomi ProFocus, a mode that allows you to intelligently identify and track the subject of the scene, so that it is the protagonist of the recording at all times and there are no blurred or out-of-focus scenes.

It is also worth noting the ultra night modeperfect for recording in low light conditions to take night photos that will surprise you with their quality.

Take the opportunity to buy your Xiaomi 12 Pro at the best price on Vodafone

As you may have seen, the Xiaomi 12 Pro is an excellent option to consider if you are looking for a mobile with a good camera. And Vodafone wants you to buy it in the best conditions.

To begin with, the red operator boasts of a wide range of devices so that you can enjoy a variety large enough for you to find the model that you like the most. In addition, some terminals are exclusively on Vodafone, as is the case with this Xiaomi 12 Pro.

The best of all is that you can buy the Xiaomi 12 Pro paying in 24 or 36 installments without interest. In this way, you can enjoy all its power without having to pay too much.

More, if we take into account the plan Re premieres of Vodafonewhere you can hand in your old phone and receive a direct discount (only if you hand it in at a store) or do it through the Vodafone website and have the reimbursement made to your bank account.

During the month of May, you can save up to €150 when buying the new Xiaomi 12 Pro – exclusive on Vodafone- with re-release, and also You have 2 free months of Vodafone Care mobile insurance Total protection (until May 31), so you will have the peace of mind of a brand new smartphone insured against any unforeseen event.

Do not miss the opportunity and take advantage of these promotions and buy the new Xiaomi with the best price on Vodafone. What more can you ask!
